page.title: 05EDUCATION IN DALBEATTIE
page.content: Education in Dalbeattie is provided by: {DALBEATTIE PRIMARY SCHOOL School Roll:362 Teaching Staff:15 Head Teacher:Mr.N.D.Kennedy. { ST.PETER'S R.C.PRIMARY SCHOOL School Roll:52 Teaching Staff:3 Head Teacher:Mr.J.T.McDonald. { DALBEATTIE HIGH SCHOOL School Roll:378 Teaching Staff:47 Head Teacher:Mr.F.Sanderson { FURTHER EDUCATION Based in{Dalbeattie High School.} Eleven different subjects were offered last winter including art,computers, woodwork and bridge.The principal is Mr.A.Mitchell. There is also a{Nursery Department} attached to Dalbeattie Primary School.
